item.title: 根据产品的工艺规格产量, 运用聚类算法划分生产线
item.description: 图片如果太小, 可以右击图片新标签查看. library(tidyverse) library(nlme) library(fable) library(tsibble) library(fpc) library(reshape2) library(purrr) library(dendextend) library(RColorBrewer) 1.整理清洗数据 产看所有离散变量分布 scheme <- read.csv("1.csv",stringsAsFactors = FALSE) apply(scheme[,c(2:11)],2,unique) $包.提 [1] "3" "4" "18" "8" "6" "/" "5" "24" "" "32" "1" "10" $提.箱 [1] "16" "1" "6" "4" "8" "10" "3" "/" "2" "" "5" "24" "18" "12" $纸长mm [1] "160" "153" "189" "133" "/" "140" $纸宽mm [1] "195" "/" $层数 [1] "4" "3" "2" "/" $成品定量.g... [1] "13.5" "13" "15" "11" "/" "12" "14.
